jobDescription: Apply Now  Senior Data Modeler - Trade and Transactions  Req #: 180064192  Location: Jersey City, NJ,US  Job Category: Technology Job Description: UTM (Unified Trade and Transaction Model) is the logical representation of data required to support JP Morgan's Trade and Transaction Event Management business capability. The primary intent is to standardize the data representation of trades and transactions across the firm, focusing on all Corporate and Investment Bank asset classes. The adoption of canonical models is foundational to a number of strategic transformation programs within the bank. UTM is to be used to develop interface definitions across applications.  The UTM team is looking to grow over the next few months.
